title: Industrial preparation of acetic acid (TEFC)
creator_credit: Barrie Whatley, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Describes the process of making acetic acid, by the oxidation of naphtha with air, in a large industrial chemicals factory. Outlines the various stages in developing the process, including laboratory research and pilot plant development.
description: Describes the process of making acetic acid, by the oxidation of naphtha with air, in a large industrial chemicals factory. Outlines the various stages in developing the process, including laboratory research and pilot plant development.
